sentences.en: A late booking may involve you in extra cost.
sentences.cn: 预订晚了的话你可能要额外多花钱。

sentences.en: Allow an extra 10-15 min if you prefer lamb well done.
sentences.cn: 如果想让羊羔肉完全熟透还需要再煮10到15分钟。

sentences.en: Allow extra time for your journey.
sentences.cn: 要给你的旅程多留出点时间。

sentences.en: an extra special effort
sentences.cn: 格外的努力

sentences.en: British Airways is putting on an extra flight to London tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 英国航空公司明天将增加一班到伦敦的航班。

sentences.en: Could you get an extra loaf of bread?
sentences.cn: 你能多拿一条面包吗？

sentences.en: Drivers are advised to take extra care.
sentences.cn: 建议司机开车要格外小心。

sentences.en: Extra police have been drafted into the town after the violence.
sentences.cn: 暴乱过后又有警力被抽调到了该镇。

sentences.en: Give your brows extra definition with Outdoor Girl'sEyebrow Pencil in Brown.
sentences.cn: 用“户外女孩”品牌的棕色眉笔更加清晰地勾勒出眉形。

sentences.en: I earn extra for working on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 我星期天工作挣外快。

sentences.en: It is incumbent upon all of us to make an extra effort.
sentences.cn: 我们所有人都必须加倍努力。

sentences.en: Residents can use the gym at no extra cost.
sentences.cn: 住客不必另外付费即可使用健身房。

sentences.en: She gave him an extra scoop of clotted cream.
sentences.cn: 她多给他加了一勺浓缩奶油。

sentences.en: Stay in bed extra late or get up specially early.
sentences.cn: 起床过晚或过早。

sentences.en: The extra field cultivated meant a proportionate increase in work.
sentences.cn: 额外开发土地意味着工作量相应增加。

sentences.en: The extra money could be spent on improving public transport.
sentences.cn: 多余的资金可以用于改善公共交通系统。

sentences.en: The police have been given extra powers to entrap drug traffickers.
sentences.cn: 警方已经被进一步授权诱捕毒贩。

sentences.en: The President is determined "to go the extra mile for peace".
sentences.cn: 总统决心“为实现和平而加倍努力”。

sentences.en: There are no hidden extras.
sentences.cn: 没有任何隐蔽的额外费用。

sentences.en: There's an extra blanket in the bottom drawer of the cupboard.
sentences.cn: 壁橱最下面的抽屉里还有一条多余的毯子。

sentences.en: They need to offer something extra to attract customers.
sentences.cn: 他们需要提供额外的东西以吸引顾客。

sentences.en: They now take extra steps to verify the creditworthiness of customers.
sentences.cn: 他们现在又采取额外措施来核实客户的信用度。

sentences.en: You can use two nappies for extra absorbency at night.
sentences.cn: 夜间可以用两块尿布来增强吸水性。

sentences.en: You’re going to have to work extra hard to pass the exam.
sentences.cn: 你要格外用功才能通过考试。

words.tran_cn: 临时演员；号外；额外的事物；上等产品

phrases.tran_cn: 额外费用；额外成本；追加费用
[化]超细的；超级的；极优的；高级优质的
特强的；超重的；加厚的；超功率的
额外的钱；[英国俚语]超速罚款单
额外报酬；奖励；额外的费用
加强的；高强度的；特别强壮的

trans.tran_cn: 额外的/地，非常，另外；额外的人
trans.tran_en: Extras are additional amounts of money that are added to the price that you have to pay for something
more of something, in addition to the usual or standard amount or number
in addition to the usual things or the usual amount

trans.tran_cn: 额外费用，附加物，群众演员
trans.tran_en: an amount of something, especially money, in addition to the usual, basic, or necessary amount
